Mapping.Description: Text Parameter for Views and Rooms to identify what Linked Model they were Copied / Associated with
Mapping.Name: TT_Link_Name

Mapping.Description: Yes/No Parameter for View Instances that indicates if they were associated with a Linked Model
Mapping.Name: TT_Linked_View

Mapping.Description: Text Parameter for View Instances that stored the GUID of the Linked Room
Mapping.Name: TT_Linked_View_GUID
